name: Leading Health Care Foundation
goal: The Leading Health Care Foundation is an academic think tank founded in 2009 by The Stockholm School of Economics. The aim is to further multi-stakeholder dialogue on health, care and healthcare based on a firm research foundation. LHC brings together over 30 organisations in Sweden ranging from government authorities to industries and patient organisations. LHC performs action research missions from the Ministry of Health, Swedish Association of Local Authorities and Regions), patient organisations and more.
interests: Digital economy and society, Public Health
euInitiatives: EU Expert Panels on Value Based Health Care and task shifting.
